[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@verseengine/verse-core](./verse-core.md) &gt; [VerseOptions](./verse-core.verseoptions.md) &gt; [maxNumberOfPeople](./verse-core.verseoptions.maxnumberofpeople.md)

## VerseOptions.maxNumberOfPeople property

Maximum number of people to display. Default is 10.

**Signature:**

```typescript
maxNumberOfPeople?: number;
```

## Remarks

It only limits the number of displays; the number of users that can exist in the same space is unlimited regardless of this value.
